DataElement.preferredName: Surgical Procedure Transurethral Resection of Bladder Tumor Other Outcome Other Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free text field that describes another response when other is chosen from a list of values related to the result that is different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned from a surgical procedure used to treat bladder tumors, during which a resectoscope is passed through the urethra and into the bladder.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Surgical Procedure Transurethral Resection of Bladder Tumor Other Outcome
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery._A surgical procedure used to treat bladder tumors, during which a resectoscope is passed through the urethra and into the bladder._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned. (NCI)_The result of an action.
